Title: Crushing the Crusade
Description:
The most powerful members of the Scarlet Crusade will be defending the nest of their leader, $n. That's where I come in. 

Nothing like a little distraction to take an enemy down swiftly. Just let me know where and when to strike.
ObjectivesText: Kill 12 Scarlet Crusade members in the Gilneas City chapel courtyard.
